metadata.description: CHAOS 01: Priority Inversion Cascade - High priority students with flexible availability vs low priority students that can only fit in prime slots
metadata.expected_failure: Algorithm either ignores priorities to maximize schedules OR respects priorities and massively under-schedules
metadata.pathological_aspect: Forces algorithm to choose between optimization objectives

metadata.description: CHAOS 01: Priority Inversion Cascade - High priority students with flexible availability vs low priority students that can only fit in prime slots
metadata.expected_failure: Algorithm either ignores priorities to maximize schedules OR respects priorities and massively under-schedules
metadata.pathological_aspect: Forces algorithm to choose between optimization objectives

metadata.description: CHAOS 02: Harmonic Resonance Pattern - Lesson durations that create harmonic interference preventing optimal packing
metadata.expected_failure: Duration combinations create impossible packing scenarios with massive unused time slots
metadata.pathological_aspect: Mathematical harmonics where certain combinations lock out all others

metadata.description: CHAOS 02: Harmonic Resonance Pattern - Lesson durations that create harmonic interference preventing optimal packing
metadata.expected_failure: Duration combinations create impossible packing scenarios with massive unused time slots
metadata.pathological_aspect: Mathematical harmonics where certain combinations lock out all others

metadata.description: CHAOS 03: Quantum Entanglement - Scheduling any one student determines the fate of multiple others through overlapping constraints
metadata.expected_failure: Greedy decisions early in search tree eliminate massive branches, causing poor global solutions
metadata.pathological_aspect: Complex dependency web where local optimization creates global catastrophe

metadata.description: CHAOS 03: Quantum Entanglement - Scheduling any one student determines the fate of multiple others through overlapping constraints
metadata.expected_failure: Greedy decisions early in search tree eliminate massive branches, causing poor global solutions
metadata.pathological_aspect: Complex dependency web where local optimization creates global catastrophe

metadata.description: CHAOS 04: Break-Induced Starvation - Teacher break requirements create systematic bias against certain students
metadata.expected_failure: Break constraints create artificial scarcity that starves students with specific lesson durations
metadata.pathological_aspect: Well-intentioned break policy creates unfair systematic discrimination

metadata.description: CHAOS 04: Break-Induced Starvation - Teacher break requirements create systematic bias against certain students
metadata.expected_failure: Break constraints create artificial scarcity that starves students with specific lesson durations
metadata.pathological_aspect: Well-intentioned break policy creates unfair systematic discrimination

metadata.description: CHAOS 05: The Oscillator - Two identical groups force tie-breaking logic to oscillate between solutions
metadata.expected_failure: Unstable sorting causes algorithm to flip between equivalent solutions, possible infinite loops
metadata.pathological_aspect: Identical priorities and constraints expose instability in tie-breaking logic

metadata.description: CHAOS 05: The Oscillator - Two identical groups force tie-breaking logic to oscillate between solutions
metadata.expected_failure: Unstable sorting causes algorithm to flip between equivalent solutions, possible infinite loops
metadata.pathological_aspect: Identical priorities and constraints expose instability in tie-breaking logic

metadata.description: CHAOS 06: Gap Optimization Trap - Minimizing gaps creates suboptimal overall schedule
metadata.expected_failure: Gap minimization objective conflicts with student maximization, creates local optimum trap
metadata.pathological_aspect: Well-intentioned optimization objective sabotages main goal

metadata.description: CHAOS 06: Gap Optimization Trap - Minimizing gaps creates suboptimal overall schedule
metadata.expected_failure: Gap minimization objective conflicts with student maximization, creates local optimum trap
metadata.pathological_aspect: Well-intentioned optimization objective sabotages main goal

metadata.description: CHAOS 07: Location Convoy Effect - Greedy location filling starves students with limited access
metadata.expected_failure: Algorithm fills popular location first, leaving location-restricted students unscheduled
metadata.pathological_aspect: First-come-first-served location allocation creates systematic unfairness

metadata.description: CHAOS 07: Location Convoy Effect - Greedy location filling starves students with limited access
metadata.expected_failure: Algorithm fills popular location first, leaving location-restricted students unscheduled
metadata.pathological_aspect: First-come-first-served location allocation creates systematic unfairness

metadata.description: CHAOS 08: Fibonacci Spiral - Lesson durations following Fibonacci sequence create impossible packing puzzles
metadata.expected_failure: Mathematical sequence creates non-optimal packing with significant wasted time
metadata.pathological_aspect: Natural mathematical patterns that don't align with scheduling grid create inefficiencies

metadata.description: CHAOS 08: Fibonacci Spiral - Lesson durations following Fibonacci sequence create impossible packing puzzles
metadata.expected_failure: Mathematical sequence creates non-optimal packing with significant wasted time
metadata.pathological_aspect: Natural mathematical patterns that don't align with scheduling grid create inefficiencies

metadata.description: CHAOS 09: Cascading Failures - Scheduling any student eliminates multiple others in domino effect
metadata.expected_failure: High constraint density causes exponential search space explosion and poor decisions
metadata.pathological_aspect: Extreme constraint coupling where every decision has massive consequences

metadata.description: CHAOS 09: Cascading Failures - Scheduling any student eliminates multiple others in domino effect
metadata.expected_failure: High constraint density causes exponential search space explosion and poor decisions
metadata.pathological_aspect: Extreme constraint coupling where every decision has massive consequences

metadata.description: CHAOS 10: Paradox Engine - Circular dependencies where A blocks B, B blocks C, C blocks A
metadata.expected_failure: Circular constraints create unsolvable scenarios with no clear optimal choice
metadata.pathological_aspect: Perfect circular logic trap where any choice leads to same suboptimal result

metadata.description: CHAOS 10: Paradox Engine - Circular dependencies where A blocks B, B blocks C, C blocks A
metadata.expected_failure: Circular constraints create unsolvable scenarios with no clear optimal choice
metadata.pathological_aspect: Perfect circular logic trap where any choice leads to same suboptimal result
